article_title: More big shipping firms stop Red Sea routes after attacks
sentence: The  Houthis  have  declared  their  support  for  Hamas  after  Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  following  the  7  October  Hamas  attacks  that  killed  1,200  people  and  saw  240  more  taken  hostage.

article_title: More big shipping firms stop Red Sea routes after attacks
sentence: Since  then,  Israel  has  killed  more  than  18,000  Palestinians  in  Gaza,  Hamas  health  officials  say.
